channel.title: Error with tab key/spaces..but where?
channel.description:
Loaded WorldMap In (719 ms)... Demise PK'ing has been activated... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2131) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:559) at server.main(server.java:124)
so i dont know how post pictures but this is what came up. ive tried going to the spots but i dont know where i made the mistake with the tab/space key. i was told it was that, so im not sure where to go other than here. i looked, cant find it. im not a super java genius. what of those spots is the spot it's wrong?..help?

item.title: Error with tab key/spaces..but where?
item.dc:creator: @Killea Killea
item.description:
@Killea wrote:

[quote=“me caveman, post:3, topic:357835”][quote author=Killea link=topic=454346.msg3327059#msg3327059 date=1283190090]

Loaded WorldMap In (719 ms)…
Demise PK’ing has been activated…
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45
at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2131)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:559)
at server.main(server.java:124)

so i dont know how post pictures but this is what came up. ive tried going to the spots but i dont know where i made the mistake with the tab/space key.
i was told it was that, so im not sure where to go other than here. i looked, cant find it. im not a super java genius. what of those spots is the spot it’s wrong?..help?

You added a new NPCdrop to an NPC? Or you made an new drop and NPC than give me the line you added, there is something miss with it
[/quote]

i had it spawn npcs and i put drops for them…did i do something there? is that the specific spot i should look over again?[/quote]

There is something wrong with it yes, can you put the line for the npc here + the drops.

Read full topic
